snippet: Tens of thousands have rallied in the capital, Sana, and several other cities to demand the removal of the former president’s relatives and allies from critical military and security positions they still hold.
lead_paragraph: Tens of thousands have rallied in the capital, Sana, and several other cities to demand the removal of the former president’s relatives and allies from critical military and security positions they still hold.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
